name: Doomlites
description:
2D Shooter Thingy, got a new version of unity so now I can build for Webgl and Macos

ADDITIONS

- A total of five levels, two where you have to kill a set number of enemies, two where you have to reach the end, and one boss level.

- Speaking of the boss, it and three other enemies have been added.

- Two new player weapons.

I would have added more levels, but I had other things to do, maybe I'll update this in the future, till then, that's about it.
